title: Playground, Sparkling Pools, Courtesy Patrol
posting_body: ['Enjoy our Sparkling Pool!', 'Timber Lodge Apartments For Rent In Thornton, CO.', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Timber Lodge', '1769 Coronado Parkway N, Thornton, CO, 80229', 'Interested in more information?', 'See link below:', '<URL>', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 1 Bath', 'Timber Lodge Apartments delivers well-appointed one and two-bedroom apartment homes in a perfect north Denver location.', 'Comfortable living spaces and the amenity-rich community are sure to delight any renter.', 'Conveniently located between downtown Denver and Boulder Timber Lodge’s location is prime for any commuter while also providing the tranquility you have come to expect from a Thornton address.', 'Timber Lodge Apartments is professionally managed and maintained by a friendly staff who set the standard for an exceptional customer experience.', 'Residents enjoy access to community features that include a playground, a soccer field and a fitness center with cardio and strength training equipment as well as lounging by our sparkling pool.', 'When the almost-always sunny Colorado weather permits, friends gather under shade of a gazebo or next to one of our BBQ Grills.', 'Our Community Clubhouse, business center and lounge for the convenience and entertainment of our residents', 'Features', '- Balconies & Patios*', '- Carpet', '- Air Conditioner', '- Walk in Closets*', '- Ceiling Fan*', '- Remodeled*', '- Dishwasher*', '- Cable Ready', '- Microwave*', '*In Select Units', 'Community Amenities', '- Carports', '- In Building Laundry Facilities (24 Hours)', '- Soccer Field', '- 24 Hour Emergency Maintenance', '- Online Payment', '- Pet Park', '- Fitness Center', '- Courtesy Patrol', '- Professional Management', '- Fun Resident Events Sponsored by Management', '- Playground', '- Picnic Area & BBQ Grills', '- Sparkling Pools', '- Media Center', '- Accepts Electronic Payment', 'Pet Policy', 'Pet Friendly', 'Up to 2 pets per household.', 'Some breed restrictions apply, contact us for details.', 'Income Requirements:', '2.5 gross income times the rent amount', 'Driving Directions', 'Take I-25 to 84th Ave, Head East, Turn South on Washington St, Head East on Coronado Parkway North, located on the right hand side.', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday:8:30AM-5:30PM', 'Saturday:10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.', 'aTr3N9RQdHCc']
